net.sf.gogui.go
Class Move

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.gogui.go.Move

public final class Move
extends java.lang.Object

Move containing a point and a color. The point can be null (for pass move). The color is black or white. This class is immutable, references are unique.

public static Move get(GoColor color,
                       GoPoint point)
Factory method for constructing a move.

Parameters:
color - The color of the move (empty can still be used for removing a stone on the board, but this will be deprecated in the future)
point - Location of the move (null for pass move)

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Get string representation of move.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
String representation using an uppercase letter for the color and an uppercase string for the point (e.g. B C3, W PASS). This representation is also guaranteed to be compatible with the formats used in the Go Text Protocol.
